title: French invasion of Russia
summary: The French invasion of Russia, also known as the Russian Campaign,[lower-alpha 1] the Second Polish War,[lower-alpha 2][18] the Second Polish Campaign,[lower-alpha 3][19] the Patriotic War of 1812 ,[lower-alpha 4] and the War of 1812,[20] was begun by Napoleon to force Russia back into the Continental blockade of the United Kingdom.
